title: Can join to token-gated community when do not meet required permissions
body:
# Bug Report


## Problem 
Potential members of token-gated communities can't see whether they can join a community or not, and they can join even if they don't meet the requirements.


#### Expected behavior
3. User1: can see that meets the requirement

#### Actual behavior
3. You hold 0 from 1.000000 SNT

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/4557972/211351d2-da92-4e52-a6e4-74f7e1473dfd

5. User2 shouldn't be able to join community
7. Error in sending a message
![IMAGE 2023-09-12 18:22:47](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/4557972/9ffd94f6-fb1d-4d16-bbd5-5195b524a569)

### Reproduction


1. Desktop: create a token-gated community with the following permission:
![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/4557972/0f9cef0a-3092-40a3-a49f-675669e66759)
2. Invite User1 (meets the requirement) and User2 (doesn't meet the requirement)
3. User1: check the community invite and join the community
5. User2: check the community invite and join community
6. User1: send message 
7. User2: send message

### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: Android, iOS
- Logs of user2: 

[comment]: # (Please, add logs/notes if necessary)
